import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../../assets/css/Login.css"; import { useParams, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import baseUrl from "../../baseUrl"; const CreateProduct = () => { const { productId } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [currentTag, setCurrentTag] = useState('flower') const [error, setError] = useState({ show: false, title: "" }) const [data, setData] = useState({ title: "", description: "", tag: "", }) const handleChange = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let newData = {...data} if(e.target.title.value === undefined || e.target.title.value === ''){ setError({...error, show: true, title: "Title cannot be empty"}) }else{ setError({...title}) setData({...data, title: e.target.title.value, description: e.target.description.value}) } newData['primarImg'] = e.target.primaryImg.value setData(newData); } console.log(error) const handleTag = (tag) => { setCurrentTag(tag) }; const handleCancel = () => { navigate("/dashboard"); }; return (
